This page showcases Steam games tagged under 'Action RPG'. Action Role-Playing Games (ARPGs) are a subgenre of role-playing games where the emphasis is on real-time combat. These games allow players to control a character directly and execute actions in real time, while also featuring RPG elements such as character development, questing, and inventory management. Players engage in battles against various enemies, utilizing a combination of melee and ranged attacks, magic, and abilities to progress. Action RPGs on Steam offer diverse gameplay experiences, ranging from dark fantasy and sci-fi settings to open worlds and narrative-driven adventures.
